__e: She's always looked out for you in her own way.
Simon, he gave orders, he watched us, and... and the other man-- he brought the girls to America.
I looked after them like they were my own.
Well, I said no at first because, well, it didn't feel terribly me, but then I thought about them leading their lives before the fall.
I didn't match up to the one person who might really have been right.
And we couldn't get the bicycle in the car and my mother started laughing and I started laughing.
Your mom had some errands to run, so she took your sisters with her and left me home in charge.
I've lost things like that before. Oh, well, I suppose it suited him all right, all right, all right, all right.
The stuff they found in the car fit in with what they believed had happened,... .. so they didn't chase it up.
